Class ControllerAgent

java.lang.Object
  com.ibm.aglet.Aglet
      ControllerAgent
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class ControllerAgent
extends com.ibm.aglet.Aglet

This class creates a child aglet called ShoppingAgent and sends it out to multiple remote sites. It also spawns a GUI interface used to add remote sites and specify a query string.

See Also:

getRemoteSiteList

public java.util.Vector getRemoteSiteList()
This method is called by the ShoppingAgent to get the list of remote sites it should visit. The method initializes a Vector object called remoteSiteList.
